item.title: ETHCapeTown 2024 – Winning with Astranova
item.description: This is a story about how I almost skipped ETHCapeTown 2024, but ended up winning 1st Place in the Tooling for Mass Adoption Track, and 4th place overall, with a project we called Astranova. What is Astranova? Astranova is a simple but powerful platform designed to help crypto traders build and analyze trading strategies in a more intuitive way. It’s built to be user-friendly, with a clean interface and real-time performance tracking.

item.title: What is Web3 and How Do Smart Contracts Work on Ethereum?
item.description: Hi, I’m David Malope, and today I want to explain some exciting topics related to Ethereum, Web3, and smart contracts. I’ll keep it simple and clear, especially for anyone with a basic understanding of tech or security. What is Web3? Web3 is the next step in the evolution of the internet. Unlike the current internet (Web2), where big companies (like Google and Facebook) control a lot of what we do online, Web3 is about giving control back to the users.
